item.title: GPS
item.description: score:77 Chances: Gap’s stock has gained 24% in the past three months. Back-to-school season shopping projected to reach $135 billion, potentially benefiting GPS. Collaboration with LoveShackFancy to create a multi-category capsule collection. Value-priced, everyday clothing brand with recognizable American identity. Risks: Sales from Gap’s clothing line are underwhelming.
